ErrorCode.name: D3DERR_WRONGTEXTUREFORMAT
ErrorCode.explanation: The pixel format of the texture surface is not valid.

ErrorCode.name: D3DERR_UNSUPPORTEDCOLOROPERATION
ErrorCode.explanation: The device does not support a specified texture-blending operation for color values.

ErrorCode.name: D3DERR_UNSUPPORTEDCOLORARG
ErrorCode.explanation: The device does not support a specified texture-blending argument for color values.

ErrorCode.name: D3DERR_UNSUPPORTEDALPHAOPERATION
ErrorCode.explanation: The device does not support a specified texture-blending operation for the alpha channel.

ErrorCode.name: D3DERR_UNSUPPORTEDALPHAARG
ErrorCode.explanation: The device does not support a specified texture-blending argument for the alpha channel.

ErrorCode.name: D3DERR_TOOMANYOPERATIONS
ErrorCode.explanation: The application is requesting more texture-filtering operations than the device supports.

ErrorCode.name: D3DERR_CONFLICTINGTEXTUREFILTER
ErrorCode.explanation: The current texture filters cannot be used together.

ErrorCode.name: D3DERR_UNSUPPORTEDFACTORVALUE
ErrorCode.explanation: The device does not support the specified texture factor value. Not used; provided only to support older drivers.

ErrorCode.name: D3DERR_CONFLICTINGRENDERSTATE
ErrorCode.explanation: The currently set render states cannot be used together.

ErrorCode.name: D3DERR_UNSUPPORTEDTEXTUREFILTER
ErrorCode.explanation: The device does not support the specified texture filter.

ErrorCode.name: D3DERR_CONFLICTINGTEXTUREPALETTE
ErrorCode.explanation: The current textures cannot be used simultaneously.

ErrorCode.name: D3DERR_DRIVERINTERNALERROR
ErrorCode.explanation: Internal driver error.

ErrorCode.name: D3DERR_NOTFOUND
ErrorCode.explanation: The requested item was not found.

ErrorCode.name: D3DERR_MOREDATA
ErrorCode.explanation: There is more data available than the specified buffer size can hold.

ErrorCode.name: D3DERR_DEVICELOST
ErrorCode.explanation: The device has been lost but cannot be reset at this time. Therefore, rendering is not possible.

ErrorCode.name: D3DERR_DEVICENOTRESET
ErrorCode.explanation: The device has been lost but can be reset at this time.

ErrorCode.name: D3DERR_NOTAVAILABLE
ErrorCode.explanation: This device does not support the queried technique.

ErrorCode.name: D3DERR_OUTOFVIDEOMEMORY
ErrorCode.explanation: Microsoft Direct3D does not have enough display memory to perform the operation.

ErrorCode.name: D3DERR_INVALIDDEVICE
ErrorCode.explanation: The requested device type is not valid.

ErrorCode.name: D3DERR_INVALIDCALL
ErrorCode.explanation: The method call is invalid. For example, a method's parameter may have an invalid value.

ErrorCode.name: D3DOK_NOAUTOGEN
ErrorCode.explanation: This is a success code. However, the autogeneration of mipmaps is not supported for this format. This means that resource creation will succeed but the mipmap levels will not be automatically generated.

ErrorCode.name: D3DXERR_CANNOTMODIFYINDEXBUFFER
ErrorCode.explanation: The index buffer cannot be modified.

ErrorCode.name: D3DXERR_INVALIDMESH
ErrorCode.explanation: The mesh is invalid.

ErrorCode.name: D3DXERR_CANNOTATTRSORT
ErrorCode.explanation: Attribute sort (D3DXMESHOPT_ATTRSORT) is not supported as an optimization technique.

ErrorCode.name: D3DXERR_SKINNINGNOTSUPPORTED
ErrorCode.explanation: Skinning is not supported.

ErrorCode.name: D3DXERR_TOOMANYINFLUENCES
ErrorCode.explanation: Too many influences specified.

ErrorCode.name: D3DXERR_INVALIDDATA
ErrorCode.explanation: The data is invalid.

ErrorCode.name: D3DXERR_LOADEDMESHASNODATA
ErrorCode.explanation: The mesh has no data.

ErrorCode.name: D3DXERR_DUPLICATENAMEDFRAGMENT
ErrorCode.explanation: A fragment with that name already exists.

ErrorCode.name: E_OUTOFMEMORY
ErrorCode.explanation: Direct3D could not allocate sufficient memory to complete the call.
